description:
When Gemma Masters auctions off her uncle's signature trench coat, she sets off a horrific chain of events in the life of John Constantine. Bleeding apartment walls, a flatulent demon, a suspicious angel and an old adversary await Constantine as he races to find the coat before it sends him back to Hell! Collected from HELLBLAZER #283-291.

Back Blurb

THE CLOTHES UNMAKE THE MAN

Soaked in the blood of humans, angels and demons. Scented with the fumes of cheap booze and expensive cigarettes. Part wizard's cloak, part black knight's armor, part madman's straitjacket --- John Constantine's trench coat has survived as much magic, mayhem and madness as the man himself.

Now it's gone missing. And John Constantine's life has become a living hell without it.

London's street sorcerer is quickly learning that his trench coat does more than keep out the cold and hide the bloodstains. Over the course of Constantine's career, it's soaked up enough supernatural energy to become an integral part of his life. Even enough to take on a life of its own.

Or take the lives of others...

Constantine's quest to reclaim his coat of many horrors will pit him against American gangsters, family secrets, and the princes of Hell itself. If he gets his hands back on his threads, will it cost him his skin?

Suit up for excitement in HELLBLAZER: THE DEVIL'S TRENCH COAT, as the acclaimed team of Peter Milligan (JUSTICE LEAGUE DARK), Giuseppe Camuncoli (SWAMP THING) and Stefano Landini (HOUSE OF MYSTERY) strip John Constantine of all he holds dear!
name: TPB

description:
The Enchantress has unleashed a wave of chaos across the globe! Shade the Changing Man, Madame Xanadu, Deadman, Zatanna, Mindwarp and John Constantine may be our only hope - but how can we trust beings whose very presence makes most people break out in a cold sweat?

Collecting JUSTICE LEAGUE DARK #1-6!

Back Blurb

WHO CAN STOP AN EVIL FORCE MORE POWERFUL THAN THE JUSTICE LEAGUE?

An out-of-control sorceress is creating havoc across the Earth, and not even the likes of Superman and Wonder Woman have been able to stop her. Clairvoyant Madame Xanadu has foreseen that the only means to save the plane is to assemble a group of the world's most powerful and bizarre heroes: Zatanna, performer of stage magic --- as well as the real thing. Reality-altering alien Shade. Cynical sorcerer John Constantine. Dead man Deadman.

Not one of them would ever choose to work with the others. And yet, this Justice League of the Dark Arts might succeed where the established Justice League has failed. Xanadu's unlikely team alone can stop the Enchantress from punishing the Earth with her unstoppable magic...but only if its members can find some way to work together.

These are dark times, indeed.

Acclaimed writer PETER MILLIGAN (RED LANTERNS) and artist MIKEL JANIN (FLASHPOINT: DEADMAN AND THE FLYING GRAYSONS) present JUSTICE LEAGUE DARK: IN THE DARK (collecting issues #1-6) starring a Justice League like none that has ever been seen before!
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Justice League Dark: In the Dark

description:
Haly's Circus, where Dick Grayson once performed, returns to Gotham City - bringing with it murder, mystery and superhuman evil. To uncover more clues to why a mysterious assassin is targeting him, Nightwing joins the circus's tour. But as Dick becomes reacquainted with the big top he once called home, he learns there are darker secrets to be discovered.

Collects NIGHTWING #1-7.

Back Blurb

YOU CAN'T ESCAPE YOUR FAMILY

Dick Grayson, Batman's former ward, must now embrace his destiny alone as the high-flyer Nightwing. Haly's Circus, where Dick grew up and performed under the big top, returns to Gotham City, bringing it with murder, mystery and superhuman mayhem. Nightwing must confront his past, among former friends and enemies from his circus days, while confronting a greater evil.

As he puts pressure on ex-Haly connections in search of answers about his past, one lead may be far too explosive to handle. With the help of Barbara Gordon (who masquerades as Batgirl), Nightwing uncovers the true nature of the circus and how it relates to his long-dead parents, the Flying Graysons. To complicate matters further, he must face off against mysterious villain Saiko, a skilled assassin who has vowed to destroy Nightwing once and for all.

Meet Gotham's young defender in NIGHTWING: TRAPS AND TRAPEZES --- collecting issues #1-7 --- brought to you by the combined talents of writer KYLE HIGGINS (BATMAN: GATES OF GOTHAM) and artist EDDY BARROWS (SUPERMAN).
name: Vol. 1

description: While Lois interrogates Toyman, Superman and Batman are under attack from The Prankster and Mr. Freeze where Batman finds himself in the unwelcome role of having to save the life of the man who killed his parents.
name: Detective Part 7

name: The Story of Rat-Tat the Toy Machine-Gun
